# Algorithm TEA <h1>
<br><br>
![GitHub Logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/a1/TEA_InfoBox_Diagram.png)
<br><br>

Message: “ MGomgCHI” => 01001101 01000111 01101111 01101101 01100111 01000011 01001000 01001001<br>
01001101 01000111 01101111 01101101 – Left part<br>
01100111 01000011 01001000 01001001 – Right part<br>
Key K0: comp -> 01100011 01101111 01101101 01110000<br>
Key K1: prog  -> 01110000 01110010 01101111 01100111<br>
Key K2: soft -> 01110011 01101111 01100110 01110100<br>
Key K3: ware ->  01110111 01100001 01110010 01100101<br>
<br><br>
Unpaired part
<br><br>
1. The right side is shifted to the left by 4 bits<br>
<< 4 01100111 01000011 01001000 01001001 = 01110100 00110100 10000100 100100000<br>

2. The value K0 mod 2 ^ 32 = is added to the result (1)<br>
(01110100 00110100 10000100 100100000 + 01100011 01101111 01101101 01110000) mod2 ^ 32 = 1001011110110000111011010010000 = 1272477328<br>

3. Add the value I * delta to the right side<br>
(01100111010000110100100001001001) + 1 * (10011110001101110111100110111001) mod2 ^ 32 = 101011110101100001000000010 = 91931138<br>

4. Result of 2 steps XOR result of 3 steps<br>
1272477328 XOR 91931138 = (1001011110110000111011010010000) XOR (101011110101100001000000010) = (1001110101000101011010010010010) => 1319285906<br>

5. On the right side, we shift to the right by 5 bits<br>
(>> 5): (01100111 01000011 01001000 01001001) (>> 5) => (000000011001110100001101001000010) => 54139458<br>

6. Add the value K1 mod 2 ^ 32 to the result of the 5th step<br>
(000000011001110100001101001000010 + 01110000011100100110111101100111) mod 2 ^ 32 = (54139458 + 1886547815) mod 2 ^ 32 = 1940687273 => 1110011101011001000100110101001<br>

7. Result of 4 steps XOR result of step 6<br>
1319285906 XOR 1940687273 = (1001110101000101011010010010010) XOR (1110011101011001000100110101001) = (111101000011100011110100111011) => 1024343355<br>

8. Add the result from step 7 mod 2 ^ 32 to the left side<br>
(1296527213+ 1024343355) mod 2 ^ 32 = 2320870568 => (10001010010101011010110010101000)

<br><br>
Even part
<br><br>

01001101 01000111 01101111 01101101 - Right side<br>
10001010 01010101 10101100 10101000 - Left side<br>

1. The right side is shifted to the left by 4 bits<br>
<< 4 01001101 01000111 01101111 01101101 = 11010100011101101111011011010000<br>

2. The value K2 mod 2 ^ 32 = is added to the result (1)<br>
(11010100011101101111011011010000 + 01110011011011110110011001110100) mod 2 ^ 32 = (3564566224 + 1936680564) mod 2 ^ 32 = 1206279492 => 1000111111001100101110101000100<br>

3. Add the value I * delta to the right side<br>
(01001101010001110110111101101101) + 1 * (10011110001101110111100110111001) mod2 ^ 32 = 11101011011111101110100100100110 => 3950962982<br>

4. Result of 2 steps XOR result of 3 steps<br>
1206279492 XOR 3950962982 = (1000111111001100101110101000100) XOR (11101011011111101110100100100110) = (10101100100110001011010001100010) => 2895688802<br>

5. On the right side, we shift to the right by 5 bits<br>
(>> 5): (01001101 01000111 01101111 01101101) (>> 5) => (00000010011010100011101101111011) => 40516475<br>

6. Add the value K3 mod 2 ^ 32 to the result of the 5th step<br>
(00000010011010100011101101111011 + 01110111011000010111001001100101) mod 2 ^ 32 = (40516475 + 2002874981) mod 2 ^ 32 = 2043391456 => 1111001110010111010110111100000<br>

7. Result of 4 steps XOR result of step 6<br>
2895688802 XOR 2043391456 = (10101100100110001011010001100010) XOR (1111001110010111010110111100000) = (11010101010100110001100110000010) => 3578993026<br>

8. Add the result from step 7 mod 2 ^ 32 to the left side<br>
(2320870568 + 3578993026) mod 2 ^ 32 = 1604896298 => (1011111101010001100011000101010)

<br><br>
Decoding
<br><br>

10111111 01010001 10001100 0101010 - Right side<br>
10001010 01010101 10101100 10101000 - Left side

<br><br>
Even part
<br><br>

1. On the right side, we shift to the left by 4 bits:<br>
(10111111 01010001 10001100 0101010) (<< 4) => (11110101000110001100010101000000)<br>

2. To the result of the 1st step, add the value K2 mod 2 ^ 32<br>
(11110101000110001100010101000000 + 01110011011011110110011001110100) mod 2 ^ 32 = (4112041280 + 1936680564) mod 2 ^ 32 = 1753754548 => 10111110101111101100000110010100<br>

3. Add 1 * to the right side part<br>
(11100101010101010111010110010010) + 1 * (10011110001101110111100110111001) = (3847583122 + 2654435769) mod 2 ^ 32 = 2207051595 => (1101000100010000010101110110100)<br>

4. Result of 2nd step XOR result of 3rd step<br>
1753754548 XOR 2207051595 = (11101011000001001100010011111111) = 3942958335<br>

5. On the right side, shift right by 5 bits<br>
(1011111101010001100011000101010) (>> 5) => (0000010111111010100011000110001) = 50153009<br>

6. Add the value of K3 mod 2 ^ 32 to the result of step 5<br>
(3942958335 + 6513010) mod 2 ^ 32 = 56666019 => 11011000001010011110100011<br>

7. Result of 4th step XOR result of 6th step<br>
3942958335 XOR 56666019 = (11101000011001000110001101011100) = 3898893148<br>

8. Add the result of step 7 mod 2 ^ 32 to the right side<br>
(3847583122 + 3898893148) mod 2 ^ 32 = 3451508974 => (01100111010000110100100001001001) => gCHI

<br><br>
Not even part
<br><br>

10111111 01010001 10001100 0101010 - Left side<br>
10001010 01010101 10101100 10101000 - Right side<br>

1. On the right side, we shift to the left by 4 bits:<br>
(10001010010101011010110010101000) (<< 4) => (10100101010110101100101010000000)<br>

2. To the result of the 1st step, add the value K0 mod 2 ^ 32<br>
(10100101010110101100101010000000 + 01100011011011110110110101110000) mod 2 ^ 32 = (2774190720 + 1668246896) mod 2 ^ 32 = 259485499 => 1111011101110110111100111011<br>

3. Add 1 * to the right side part<br>
(10001010010101011010110010101000) + 1 * (10011110001101110111100110111001) = (2320870568 + 2654435769) mod 2 ^ 32 = 1225259446 => (1001001000001111111100110110110)<br>

4. Result of 2nd step XOR result of 3rd step<br>
259485499 XOR 1225259446 = (1111011101110110111100111011) XOR (1001001000001111111100110110110) = (1000110011100001001011010001101) = 1181783693<br>

5. On the right side, shift right by 5 bits<br>
(10001010010101011010110010101000) (>> 5) => (00000100010100101010110101100101) = 72527205<br>

6. Add the value of K1 mod 2 ^ 32 to the result of step 5<br>
(72527205 + 1684366706) mod 2 ^ 32 = 1773922673 => 1101001101110111110100101110001<br>

7. Result of 4th step XOR result of 6th step<br>
1181783693 XOR 1773922673 = (1000110011100001001011010001101) XOR (1101001101110111110100101110001) = (101111110010110111111111111100) = 801865724<br>

8. Add the result of step 7 mod 2 ^ 32 to the right side<br>
(2865790973 + 801865724) mod 2 ^ 32 = 1447589235 => (01001101010001110110111101101101) => MGom<br>
01001101010001110110111101101101 + 01100111010000110100100001001001 => MGomgCHI
